content: 2 4 6 8 *k2 p11 k2 p6 repeat to 2nd marker row 3 *k6 p2 k2 y/o k2 sk2p k2 y/o k2 p2 repeat as before row 5 *k6 p2 k3 y/o k1 sk2p k1 y/o k3 p2 row 7 make buttonhole on this row and then every 1 75 inches in height cable 3/3 p2 k4 y/o sk2p y/o k4 p2 cast on 73 sts there is a 5 st garter edge on each side of the knitting the buttonholes are placed on beginning edge the one beside the cable so the wavy edge is at the bottom see pic row 1 k5 pm place marker lc 3 times pm k5 keeping the first and last 5 sts in garter st all knit repeat row 1 following the lc pattern remember to place buttonholes appropriately when cowl measures 5 5 inches in height b/o bind off loosely just don t do it on a cable row block add buttons and enjoy i love this in homespun yarn makes me feel pampered copyright 2026 barbara hurd
